name: rag-prototype
description: A RAG prototype using PostgreSQL + pgvector with FastMCP

scripts.test:connection: docker exec rag-postgres pg_isready -U raguser -d rag
scripts.test:db: docker exec rag-postgres psql -U raguser -d rag -c "SELECT 'Database ready!';"
scripts.test:system: node -e "const { PostgreSQLRetriever } = require('./retriever/postgresql-retriever.js'); async function test() { const retriever = new PostgreSQLRetriever(); await retriever.initialize(); console.log('âœ… RAG System ready!'); } test().catch(console.error);"
